description: From high alpine monsoons on mountain missions to rainy trail explorations, the FineLine Stretch Rain Shell has you covered. Featuring our BD.dry™ waterproof/breathable/windproof technology, the FineLine is a durable, lightweight stretch shell built for mountain adventures.
name: Black Diamond Fineline Stretch Rain Shell - Mens

specs.value: BD.dry™ 2.5L, Two-way stretch woven face with DWR finish (110 gsm, 100% Nylon)
